scripts.build-flowMapper: cd lambdas/flowMapper && rm flowMapper.zip || true && npm ci --only=prod && zip -r flowMapper .
scripts.build-sqsTrigger: cd lambdas/sqsTrigger && rm sqsTrigger.zip || true && npm ci --only=prod &&  zip -r sqsTrigger .
scripts.build-asyncFlow: cd lambdas/flows/asyncFlow && rm asyncFlow.zip || true && npm ci --only=prod && zip -r asyncFlow .
scripts.build-dbProxy: cd lambdas/dbProxy && rm dbProxy.zip || true && npm ci --only=prod && zip -r dbProxy .
scripts.build_lambdas: npm run build-flowMapper && npm run build-sqsTrigger && npm run build-asyncFlow && npm run build-dbProxy
scripts.deploy: npm run build_lambdas && npm run terraform_build
